name: Birdopolis
blurb: A bird game with break-dancing sparrows, winged mad scientists, crime-fighting grackles, and lots of heart!

rewards.reward: 10 Bird Bucks (used to get virtual items in the game) \u25cf A hearty "Thank you!" from the Birdopolis team
55 Bird Bucks \u25cf Bigger "Thank you!" than at $1 level (imagine us giving you an air hug)

[PHYSICAL ITEM] Our limited-edition "Birdopolis" pin \u25cf Exclusive in-game decorative item - Fresh Daffodils! \u25cf 125 Bird Bucks \u25cf (Please add $15 for international shipping if not in the US)
You have officially unlocked the power of BIRDOPOLIS UNLIMITED!! It's Birdopolis, experienced as a PC game. This version has no premium currency, and having friends in the game is  just a fun option.
You've upgraded to BIRDOPOLIS UNLIMITED PLUS!! You'll have all the power of BIRDOPOLIS UNLIMITED, PLUS all the energy you'll ever need!

[PHYSICAL ITEM] 2 of our limited-edition pins ("Birdopolis" + "MY TITMOUSE IS TUFTED") \u25cf Exclusive Birdopolis desktop wallpaper KUNG FU WARBLER \u25cf Your name at the "Feathered Friend" level of the Hall of Fame \u25cf 450 Bird Bucks \u25cf All previous rewards (except Bird Bucks and limited rewards) \u25cf (Please add $15 for international shipping if not in the US)
Holy smokes, you've reached BIRDOPOLIS UNLIMITED ULTRA!! Packed with special features, bonus content, surprises, triple rewards, and the unique gaming experience of Birdopolis Premium Plus.

[PHYSICAL ITEM] All 3 of our limited-edition pins (2 Previous + "ROCK OUT WITH YOUR HAWK OUT") \u25cf In-game Magic Hat Gnome \u25cf 1000 Bird Bucks \u25cf All previous rewards (except Bird Bucks and limited rewards) \u25cf (Please add $15 for international shipping if not in the US)
EARLY BIRD REWARD: Everything from the $100 tier for only $80! This is only available to the first 20 backers that pledge this amount.

[PHYSICAL ITEM] "Dance Like a Woodcock" OR "Grackle Spackle" T-shirt \u25cf 2,000 Bird Bucks \u25cf All previous rewards (except Bird Bucks and limited rewards) \u25cf (Please add $15 for international shipping if not in the US)

[PHYSICAL ITEM] Premium quality Birdopolis poster \u25cf Your name in our Hall of Fame at the "Partner in Flight" Level \u25cf Birdopolis Unlimited Ultra \u25cf All previous rewards (except Bird Bucks and limited rewards) \u25cf (Please add $15 for international shipping if not in the US)
[PHYSICAL ITEM] Snazzy Birdopolis Hoodie \u25cf Birdopolis Unlimited Ultra \u25cf All previous physical items! \u25cf (Please add $15 for international shipping if not in the US)

You are the wind beneath our wings! \u25cf Name/design a Luxury Bird House (Want a pyramid? Circus tent? Small opera house?) \u25cf Your name in the Hall of Fame at the "Wind Beneath Our Wings" level \u25cf 10,000 Bird Bucks \u25cf All previous rewards INCLUDING prior physical items (except Bird Bucks and limited rewards)\r\n\u2028

[PHYSICAL ITEM] Exclusive SIGNED art book of Gabor Szikszai's Birdopolis art \u25cf SIGNED premium quality Birdopolis poster \u25cf Everything from the $500 tier, INCLUDING prior physical items! \u25cf (Please add $15 for international shipping if not in the US)

Crowned Eagle Level! \u25cf Name/design a major civic building (Your own football stadium? Flight School? Observatory?) \u25cf Your name and picture in the Hall of Fame at the "Crowned Eagle" level \u25cf 20,000 Bird Bucks \u25cf All previous rewards (except Bird Bucks and limited rewards)

Wow! Emperor Penguin Level! \u25cf A North American bird character of your choice added to the game \u25cf Name and picture in our Hall of Fame at the "Emperor Penguin" level \u25cf Birdopolis Unlimited Ultra \u25cf All previous rewards (except Bird Bucks) INCLUDING prior physical items!\r\n\u2028

You, my friend, are a Grand Master Bird Ninja \u25cf Everything from prior tiers \u25cf Design a Star Bird alongside artist Gabor Szikszai to be prominently featured in the game \u25cf Join the crazy and ever-entertaining Birdopolis team for a pizza lunch! (transportation not provided) \u25cf Name and picture in our Hall of Fame at the "Grand Master Bird Ninja" level \u25cf Birdopolis Unlimited Ultra \u25cf All previous rewards (except Bird Bucks) INCLUDING prior physical items!
